serviceDevelopmentDesc: Application development from scratch to deployment
serviceUIUXDesc: Design your application to your minimalist request or however you want it
serviceMaintenanceDesc: Continuous updates, bug fixing, and performance monitoring to keep your app running smoothly
contactSubtitle: Have a project in mind? Let's talk.
projectsSubtitle: A selection of my recent work
projDesc1: Quit smoking tracker application tailored to help users reduce and stop smoking. Tracks days, health benefits, and financial savings.
projDesc2: 2D Top-down shooter game featuring procedural world generation, dynamic biomes, and boss battles.
projDesc3: My personal portfolio built with Flutter Web. Responsive design, custom animations, EmailJS integration, and multi-language support.
projDesc4: An application that manages appointments for all types of beauty salons.
projDesc5: A management application for restaurants or fast food stalls.
projDesc6: An application that integrates AI to generate invoices, save contacts, store data in a DB, and share the billing environment with others.
